descriptionHtml:
[size=6][u]WARNING: [/u]This mod will not work without the Dawnguard DLC.[/size]

[size=5]ABOUT[/size]
[size=3]
Ever wanted to summon a vampire in Skyrim? Now you can![/size]

Conjure up to two (with Twin Souls perk) powerful Vampires with spells and 1 Glass sword.

Duration: 180 seconds
Magicka Cost to Cast: 200

CONJURED VAMPIRE STATS:

Spells:
Conjure Mistman
Ice Storm
Icy Spear
Thunderbolt
Dread Zombie

Equipment:
Regular Vampire Outfit
Glass sword with shock enchantment

Stats:
Health: 450
Magicka: 350
Stamina: 200





[u][size=5]Version History[/size]

[/u]1.0: Initial release


[size=5]Suggest some! 

[/size]I will strictly be doing only Conjuration spells, I'm always looking for new ideas! Leave any suggestion of a conjuration spell that you would like to be added!
author: Vamure
